mapper.sql: art_id, art_title, art_join_date, art_contents, art_file, art_important, art_hits
mapper.select: SELECT art_id, art_title, art_file, art_hits, SUBSTR(art_join_date,0,10) as art_join_date from article order by art_id desc
SELECT art_id, art_title, art_file, art_hits, SUBSTR(art_join_date,0,10) as art_join_date from article where art_important = '공지' order by art_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT into article(art_id, art_title, art_contents, art_file, art_important) VALUES(art_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file}, #{important})
INSERT INTO article_file(file_id, file_name, art_id) VALUES (artf_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{artId})
mapper.select:
SELECT * from article
WHERE art_title LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by art_id desc

SELECT art_id, art_title, SUBSTR(art_join_date,0,10) as art_join_date, art_contents, art_file, art_important, art_hits FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY art_id) NUM, art_id, art_title, SUBSTR(art_join_date,0,10) as art_join_date, art_contents, art_file, art_important, art_hits from article order by art_id) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{page} AND 10

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY art_id desc) NUM, art_id, art_title, SUBSTR(art_join_date,0,10) as art_join_date, art_contents, art_file, art_important, art_hits from article
WHERE art_title LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
ORDER BY art_id) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{pageStart}
AND #{perPageNum}
AND (#{perPageNum} + #{pageStart}) - 1
order by art_id desc
